deepdep 0.0.1
  • Reference

deepdep

Source: R/deepdep.R
deepdep.Rd

deepdep.

deepdep(package, downloads = FALSE, depth = 1)

Arguments

package

A character. Name of the package that is on CRAN.
downloads

A logical. If TRUE add package downloads data. By default it's FALSE.
depth

An integer. Depth of package dependency. By default it's 1.

Value

An object of deepdep class.

Examples

library(deepdep)

dd <- deepdep("stringr", downloads = TRUE)
dd
#>    origin        name  version     type last_day last_week last_month
#> 1 stringr        glue >= 1.2.0  Imports    33710    196306     852434
#> 2 stringr    magrittr     <NA>  Imports   119796    789519    3439170
